CustomBehavior.Text:
Thank you for taking the time to use Cava's profiles and I hope you have enjoyed them so far.


Please report any bugs to help our team members improve the profiles
 To ensure your questing goes smoothly, make sure you enable and properly setup:
 AutoEquip2


Also be sure to:
 Send gold and bags to a character in the process of leveling
 Be sure to set the food and drink options in Honorbuddy
 Configure a mail recipient in Honorbuddy
This profile have some quests particularly writen for race Human. That quests will be ignored.
